When served, Tunisian Jewish Djerban Wheat Berries typically appear as a hearty, **solid and textured stew-like dish** rather than a soupy one. The wheat berries themselves are tender but maintain a chewy, slightly firm bite, resembling small, plump, glossy grains roughly the size of barley or large seeds.
